thread.title: Veronica Turvey

author: Veronica Turvey
title: Veronica Turvey
text: My tyres were a little late being fitted, but this was not the fitter's fault as he had experienced a breakdown and had to call out another fitter to collect my tyres from him and then come and fit them. The chap that fitted my tyres was really nice and had all four changed in no time at all, I would recommend tyresonthedrive.com and will use them again.
